channel.title: Please its a simple question
channel.description:
i just started my first 562 server and i need to know how to change the ips of a 562 client...
I only found 1 ip in the client.java and i changed that, but its still connecting to my localhost
So were would i find the other ips? there is no egui or gui so where are they?
